name: Mars Conqueror
description:
You have arrived to a new planet. Your mission is to rescue the planet from the horrible dictator.

This game has 2 game modes:

- Free Play: You appear somewhere in the planet and your mission is to kill as much as enemies as possible. 

- Campaign: You help saving the planet. The campaig is still in development but you can play the first part.

The intention of this game is create a community which involves all the players and help developing.

Thanks to ESEL Games and Quim Sabaté
